nodes.text: S1-M0 "Doc Simon" was a battle droid of the Galactic Republic active during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY it was aboard the Thranta-class corvette Brentaal Star during the Attack on the Brentaal Star by the Gage-class transport Black Talon. S1-M0 was in a boarding party against that vessel, accompanied by Sergeant Boran, Corporal Hattak and Private Keemos. They defended their boarding shuttle against a counterattack by an Imperial strike team, but after were all killed.
S1-M0 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Black Talon" flashpoint only if player choose the Light Side option during their conversation with Captain Orzik, keeping him alive.
